ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_issubg | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ S C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_simp1bi | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
